Articles.Content:
Hello, today after the Making History expansion installed I launched the game and no output sound at all. My sound works perfectly fine for other games or browser, only KSP seems to not work. I checked online to see if I could fix it myself, but I can not. the game is not muted on the mixer and I don't know what to do to fix this problem.

I would appreciate a little help from people that know what they are doing. Tanks

build id = 02089

Output_Log_part1
Output_log_part2

I hope this has a solution because KSP is my favorite game and I was so hyped for the Making History expansion.
 

Edited March 13, 2018 by NaturalTech
Hmm... Restarting the computer seems to fix it. Strange, this type of problem never happened to me before and I didn't thought of restarting the computer.
